body.name: aidowocam 2024 Upgraded Spy Camera WiFi Hidden Camera, Findview 100 Days Standby Battery Life,AI Motion Detection Alerts, Clear Night Vision,Real Time Record Surveillance Camera for Indoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Cloud Storage & Local Storage】The battery camera allows financial encryption,you’ll never miss out on a moment with remote playback video on the encrypted Cloud service wherever you are.When your device and memory card are lost, cloud storage safely protects your data from being lost, and you can view the recorded files at any time.

【Easy To Use 】Easily follow the 3 steps of WI-FI configuration and simple to use the camera for users, Please follow the instructions and you can make the camera start to work within 3 minutes,and camera no voice.

【During Day And Night 】 This wireless Indoor Mini camera provides a quality video and image（Camera has no sound). Regarding night vision,this home security camera offers clear visibility at all times, day or night.

【PIR Motion Detection Function】Smart Camera PIR sensors to easily and quickly detect people, cars, pets and packages, and the security camera system can wake up in short time and capture all human movements. Live streaming 24/7 with real-time motion.Recorded video without sound(Via Amazon no audio policy).

【High Video Quality & During Day And Night 】 This wireless Indoor Mini camera provides a quality video and image. Regarding night vision,this home security camera offers clear visibility at all times, day or night. The included app allows for easy access to recorded video from anywhere, anytime.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 63 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact camera for all occasions.
reviews.reviewText: I use this camera to keep an eye on my room where I stay. The camera is easy to set up and go with what ever WiFi you’re using. The view is clear and wide. The microphone picks up sound very clearly.Great compact camera for the price. Definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so extremely pleased with this purchase. The setup was very easy and not at all technically challenging. The picture quality is surprisingly good and I tested it a lot and it picks up activity very accurately. I love how small and discrete it is for privacy. The cloud service is easy as well and customer service got back to me in the middle of the night - they must be abroad. No complaints and I will be purchasing a second unit :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice picture and audio
reviews.reviewText: This is the first security camera I have bought. It is conveniently sized and, easy to get up and running. The picture is good and the audio is better! I would buy more if needed. The price was fair too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: So far it works as described. I look forward to trying it out more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear, Discreet, Easy to Use Camera
reviews.reviewText: Clear picture, amazing audio quality. I have visitors at my house and things kept disappearing. Thanks to this camera I was able to find out what was going on. Set up was very easy and now I can check on my kids and house from anywhere. Best part is that it’s undetectable, so I was able to observe with no issues. Great for use as a nanny cam as well.I highly recommend this camera if you want something discreet and easy to use with a clear image, so powerful, I love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed as I have previously purchased their 1080p camera and the quality was great. This one was supposed to be an upgrade to 4k but the advertising is wrong. It is still a 1080p product at a higher price than the previous one. Also, the app has less options for this camera than the previous one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not quite up to spec
reviews.reviewText: 4k seems more like 1080p or 2k at the most.Refresh rate on the video is about 5fps and the latency is huge.App worked flawlessly and is clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera picks every moment. It was user friendly. The picture quality great and what I like the most it is small and give you the same quality as most high end cameras. Now if you need sound this camera does not offer it but for me I am okay with that. It you need a small and powerful purchase this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The camera is amazing the only issue it when u try and look back at what u have record it's a completely black recording

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a new puppy and wanted a camera (with sound) that I could use to monitor her whilst she was in her crate, without spending a silly amount of money. The camera allows me to check to see if she is crying/barking, if she has settled ok. I am really pleased with the camera it does exactly what I wanted and has given me peace of mind. I'm not a very techie. person but the camera was so easy to set up after installing the relevant app on my phone. I'm really pleased with my purchase & would highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera was bought so I could watch my pets and communicate with them whilst I was out of the house. This is an amazing product that has exceeded all my expectations for the price I paid.The night vision on this camera is incredible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like for the fact of being easy to install and it gives a very good image for indoor and you can hear and see very clearly. Easy to move or positioning everywhere you feel suitable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to be able to keep an eye on my resuce dog in the kicthen at night . for £13 quid it is perfect and does what I need it to. Easy set up via QR code and app and intercom works well
